definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: My opinion on that is that both food addiction and sex addiction are very real.
sentences.chinese: 我的看法是，嗜食症或性癮癖是相當真實的。

sentences.english: Food addiction is very common and sex addiction is very rare.
sentences.chinese: 嗜食症很常見，性癮癖就很少見。

sentences.english: Two womanizing bachelors fall in love with twin sisters who run a sex addiction clinic.
sentences.chinese: 兩個沉溺於女色的單身漢愛上孿生姐妹運行性癮診所。

sentences.english: The sex addiction recovery centers are usually run by Christians.
sentences.chinese: 性癮康復中心通常也是基督徒開的。

definition: please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
lit. a thief crying "Stop the thief!" (idiom)/fig. to accuse sb of a theft and try to sneak away oneself/to cover up one's misdeeds by shifting the blame onto others
to desensitize/to remove an allergic susceptibility
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: to postpone one's graduation (e.g. by undertaking additional studies) (abbr. for 延後畢業|延后毕业[yan2 hou4 bi4 ye4])
to hold back from saying precisely what is on one's mind
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
lit. Lord Ye's passion for dragons (idiom)/fig. to pretend to be fond of sth while actually fearing it/ostensible fondness of sth one really fears
A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3

definition: Every family goes through its problems. (idiom)
pinyin: jia1 jia1 you3 ben3 nan2 nian4 de5 jing1
